adapters

Class DestinationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • adapters.DestinationAdapter

  • public class DestinationAdapter
extends
    Custom array adapter to display the destination information for the claim manager. ALso sets the on click listener for each element to allow the attachment of locations.
